text: Viggo Peter Mortensen, Jr. (born October 20, 1958, in New York City) is an American theater and movie actor, poet, musician, photographer and painter. He is best known for his role as Aragorn in Peter Jackson's Lord of the Rings movie trilogy. == Movies == *Witness (1985) *G.I. Jane (1997) *The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001) *The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (2002) *The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003) *Hidalgo (2004) *A History of Violence (2005) == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==Other websites== Category:Satellite Award winners Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American photographers Category:American poets Category:Actors from New York City Category:Writers from New York City
title: Viggo Mortensen
